trans-unit.source: Extends design-time behavior for the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard"></xref> Web server control.
trans-unit.target: Estende o comportamento de tempo de design para o <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard"> </xref> controle de servidor Web.

trans-unit.source: Extend the CreateUserWizardDesigner class if you want to create a designer for a class that extends the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard> Web server control.
trans-unit.target: Estender a classe CreateUserWizardDesigner se você deseja criar um designer para uma classe que estende o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard>controle de servidor Web.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.CreateUserWizardDesigner"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.CreateUserWizardDesigner"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection"></xref> object for this designer.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection"> </xref> objeto para este designer.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection"></xref> associated with this designer.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection"> </xref> associado a este designer.

trans-unit.source: Creates a <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegion"></xref> object for each step associated with the underlying wizard control, and then adds it to the specified <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegionCollection"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Cria um <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegion"> </xref> para cada etapa associada ao controle subjacente do assistente e o adiciona ao especificado <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegionCollection"> </xref> objeto.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegionCollection"></xref> to which regions associated with the wizard control are added.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegionCollection"> </xref> para quais regiões associados ao controle do assistente são adicionados.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerAutoFormatCollection"></xref> object associated with this designer.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerAutoFormatCollection"> </xref> objeto associado a este designer.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerAutoFormatCollection"></xref> associated with this designer.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerAutoFormatCollection"> </xref> associado a este designer.

trans-unit.source: Converts the child controls associated with the underlying wizard control to a custom navigation template.
trans-unit.target: Converte os controles filho associados ao controle do assistente subjacente a um modelo de navegação personalizada.

trans-unit.source: Gets the HTML that provides information about the specified exception.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o HTML que fornece informações sobre a exceção especificada.

trans-unit.source: This method is typically called after an error has been encountered at design time.
trans-unit.target: Este método é chamado normalmente depois que foi encontrado um erro em tempo de design.

trans-unit.source: The exception that occurred.
trans-unit.target: A exceção que ocorreu.

trans-unit.source: The HTML for the specified exception.
trans-unit.target: O HTML para a exceção especificada.

trans-unit.source: Initializes the designer and loads the specified component.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa o designer e carrega o componente especificado.

trans-unit.source: The control element being designed.
trans-unit.target: O elemento de controle que está sendo criado.

trans-unit.source: Exposes the properties associated with each default step through the property grid on the designer tool.
trans-unit.target: Expõe as propriedades associadas a cada etapa padrão através da grade de propriedade sobre a ferramenta de designer.

trans-unit.source: The PreFilterProperties method provides a way to add items to the dictionary of properties that a designer exposes.
trans-unit.target: O método PreFilterProperties fornece uma maneira de adicionar itens ao dicionário de propriedades que expõe um designer.

trans-unit.source: The keys in the dictionary of properties are the names of the properties.
trans-unit.target: As chaves no dicionário de propriedades são os nomes das propriedades.

trans-unit.source: The objects are of type <xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor>.
trans-unit.target: Os objetos são do tipo <xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor>.</xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor"></xref> objects that represent the properties of the component's base class.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor"> </xref> classe de base de objetos que representam as propriedades do componente.

trans-unit.source: The keys in the dictionary of properties are property names.
trans-unit.target: As chaves no dicionário de propriedades são nomes de propriedade.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the designer uses the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard"></xref> control itself to generate the design-time HTML or uses a temporarily created copy.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se o designer usa o <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard"> </xref> controlar para gerar o HTML de tempo de design ou usa uma cópia criada temporariamente.

trans-unit.source: When the value of the UsePreviewControl property is `true`, the designer uses a temporary copy of the wizard control to generate the design-time HTML; when the value of UsePreviewControl is `false`, the designer uses the wizard control itself to generate the design-time HTML.
trans-unit.target: Quando o valor da propriedade UsePreviewControl é `true`, o designer usa uma cópia temporária do controle do Assistente para gerar o HTML de tempo de design; quando o valor de UsePreviewControl é `false`, o designer usa o próprio controle do Assistente para gerar o HTML em tempo de design.

trans-unit.source: The value of UsePreviewControl modifies the return value of the designer's <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.ViewControl%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: O valor de UsePreviewControl modifica o valor de retorno do designer de <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.ViewControl%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.ViewControl%2A>

trans-unit.source: When UsePreviewControl is `true`, <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.ViewControl%2A> returns a copy of the wizard control.
trans-unit.target: Quando for UsePreviewControl `true`, <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.ViewControl%2A>retorna uma cópia do controle wizard.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.ViewControl%2A>

trans-unit.source: When UsePreviewControl is `false`, <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.ViewControl%2A> returns the wizard control itself.
trans-unit.target: Quando for UsePreviewControl `false`, <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.ViewControl%2A>retorna o próprio controle de assistente.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.ViewControl%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the wizard control is marked with a class-level <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.SupportsPreviewControlAttribute> attribute, the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.SupportsPreviewControlAttribute> is ignored, because the value of UsePreviewControl is always `true`.
trans-unit.target: Se o controle do assistente está marcado com um nível de classe <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.SupportsPreviewControlAttribute>atributo, o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.SupportsPreviewControlAttribute>é ignorado, porque o valor de UsePreviewControl é sempre `true`.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.SupportsPreviewControlAttribute> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.SupportsPreviewControlAttribute>

trans-unit.source: Always<xref uid="langword_csharp_ true" name=" true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Always<xref uid="langword_csharp_ true" name=" true" href=""></xref>.
